name: USCivicsTest
0:
”Alexa, open civics test”
”Alexa, ask civics test to start a quiz”
”Alexa, ask civics test to train me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: civics test
des:
This skill will help you prepare for the United States naturalization test. The skill mimics the real USCIS exam by randomly asking 10 questions out of the 100 possible questions. Answers are not presented as multiple choice questions; rather you are supposed to say out the answer yourself. This is exactly how you would be tested during your naturalization interview.

The skill has a quiz mode and a training mode. In Quiz mode you are asked 10 random questions and at the end you are presented your score. 

In training mode, the 100 questions are divided into 5 sets of 20 questions each (we call them question sets). This allows you to focus on 20 questions at a time. Questions from a question set are asked sequentially and if your answer is incorrect, the skill tells you the correct answer; so that you can learn and remember.

To make learning easy, we have worked with an experienced academician to come up with the preparation format.

PREMIUM CONTENT
In training mode questions from 21 - 100 i.e question sets 2, 3, 4 and 5 are available as part of one time in-skill purchase. Questions 1 - 20 are available for free

About 12 Tech: We are a tech consulting company and specialize in voice apps for Alexa. Get in touch with us if you need custom Alexa skill development: email: info@12techllc.com or visit https://12techllc.com

Photo credits: https://pixabay.com/en/statue-of-liberty-landmark-close-1045266/

Disclaimer: This is NOT an official USCIS skill. It is built by a private party and is not associated in any way with the USCIS. Also no guarantees are given with regards to your success in the exam or the information presented in the skill.

Also NOTE that in the curriculum, there are 6 questions with variable answers; those are not included in the question sets
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
